label: cascading_failure_01_ep_019
content:

### Alerts
- Alert Name: CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION, Severity: critical, Host: gateway-02, Value: pool=third_party_geo events=15 waiting=95
- Alert Name: SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT, Severity: critical, Host: service-b-01, Value: retry_count=340 retry_rate_pct=0.28
- Alert Name: CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE, Severity: critical, Host: gateway-01, Value: error_pct=2.30

### Deployments
- No deployments

### Events
- Reduced service-B concurrency limit from 120 to 90 (config)
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Added synthetic probe for geo vendor from us-east-1
- Scaled checkout-worker pool from 10 to 12 instances

### On Call
- Shift: J. Martinez. 11 pages. 4 tickets (SRV-B-250 concurrency, POOL-571, CO-812, SYN-44). Status: Mitigating.
